column2: 'content': 'You will be playing a social deception game with several other players. There is a team of GOOD players and a team of EVIL players; there are more GOOD players than EVIL players. At night
column3: players might die if they are killed by the EVIL DEMON
column4: the IMP. The EVIL team wants to kill all of the GOOD players; the GOOD players want to nominate
column6: and execute the EVIL DEMON. Every player has a role. Here is a list of all possible roles

which are GOOD:

LIBRARIAN: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)

column12: you learn which character died by execution today.\nMONK: Each night (but not the first night)

column33: which is EVIL:\nIMP: Each night except the first
column34: choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way
